title: Fully Load Site
content:
I want to know if there is a way to make Firefox fully load a websites content


Like the video shown, this was taken on another browser, the browser used here is Edge, I had to scroll in order for it fully load its contents and on other browsers if there is such an option of loading it'll automatically load all the websites contents without me scrolling at all such as Brave.


https://tempclip.com/RO5TtZYLAlf3oz7/watch
creator: desktop141

title: The address wasn’t understood (webpack)
content:
Please excuse me if I miss any details.... this is my third time trying to submit this issue.

I will just skip to the meat of it this time. I'm getting this error while working from my localhost. I have been working on a personal project for years with this set up with no issues until today. I can no longer click on the errors in the console log and be directed to the Debugger tab. When I click on errors, nothing happens. If I try to open them in a New Tab, I get the error below:


The address wasn’t understood

Firefox doesn’t know how to open this address, because one of the following protocols (webpack) isn’t associated with any program or is not allowed in this context. 

   You might need to install other software to open this address.


I have also noticed firefox does not even load all the files until I refresh it at least twice. Even when it is all loaded properly, the error persists.

I have tried: - restarting firefox - restarting my computer - clearing ALL cache and cookies - running firefox in safe mode - disabling all add ons - disabling performance mode (was already off) - checking network.protocol-handler.external.javascript = false (it is)

Let me know if there is any other information I can provide. I really dislike having to work in chrome for this so I hope I can find a solution as soon as possible.
creator: iamshi

title: Firefox suddenly will not open, uninstalled and reinstalled, still does not open
content:
Afer working seamlessly for years, Firefox will not open. I uninstalled and reinstalled several times but the application "Firefox" did not update. The most recent Firefox update was May 11 2023 and today in May 20. The only files that updated ( have May 20 as date modified) are install, installation telemetry, post signing data and zoneldProvenanceData. The Firefox application is dated May 11.

When I click on the Firefox icon on the taskbar, the hourglass indicating the program is loading, shows for sec or two, then disappears. I can't update my profile becase the app will not open. Please help, Sue
creator: triplepointh2o

title: HOW to FIND / VIEW my SAVED POCKET items.
content:
I have been using (VIEWING articles in // saving articles TO my) FIREFOX "POCKET" for more than a year.

I have the pocket ICON on my upper toolbar. But ALL that seems to do is allow me to ADD an open page TO Pocket. I have NO clue how to simply **Go t o POCKET** and VIEW any / all my saved items there.

Good God, WHAT is the secret handshake??! ...in trying to figure this out I see numerous things telling me to SIGN IN to pocket ... IF way back when I began using pocket I MADE a USER NAME / Password for it, that info is long forgotten. I HAVE a FIREFOX account ... was sent therewhile supposedly (according to Firefox" HELP") to 'sign in' to my POCKET account. Only took me to an overall FIREFOX account page - wherein NO LONK there referred AT ALL to POCKET.

I 'SAVE' to my pocket (ICON) almost daily. NEVER need any kind of sign in for this. NOW I want to LOOK AT / READ some of these - BUT FIND NOWAY TO GET THERE. ICON omly SAVES a page.

Ridiculous. HOW do I VIEW / SEE / FIND /READ my saved pocket items?
creator: BilboPISSED

title: Firefox keeps resetting my security settings.
content: Hello. I hope you are having a great day. I like the feature where if I saved the password, Firefox automatically puts them in for me, but for some unknown reason, the settings keep reverting back and removing this option. It does not save my preferences so if I restart my computer, I have to change the settings again which is getting frustrating. Is there anything I can do to make this option permanent? Thanks for any info and have a great day Kind Regards John
creator: johnattard

title: credit card auto fill not working
content: the credit card auto fill stopped working. the stored card number pops up in a box but when I select the card it does not populate into the card number field. there have been past inquires about this but they have been archived and I did not see a fix suggested. (windows 11 desktop)
creator: cdadyj
